professionalSummary.title: PHP Full-Stack Developer
professionalSummary.summary: Results-driven PHP Full-Stack Developer with almost 4 years of expertise in crafting efficient applications and APIs. Proven track record in collaborative team environments, delivering user-focused solutions on time and within scope.

workExperience.companyDescription: A market-leading enterprise specializing in integrated compliance management solutions.
workExperience.title: Full Stack PHP Developer
workExperience.description: Contributed to advancing a new platform iteration.
milestones: Engineered and implemented customized system modifications for 8 key clients, resulting in a 7% increase in overall client satisfaction.
Developed Restful APIs for a unified notification system, encompassing SMS, email, and platform integration.
Led migration of legacy systems to a modern React interface, improving page load times by 15%.
Conducted proactive maintenance tasks, ensuring a 7% decrease in reported issues.
Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams, resulting in a 30% faster implementation of client-requested features.
Participated in a Hackathon, achieving a 50% completion milestone for innovative tools slated for implementation in the upcoming version.

workExperience.companyDescription: A global IT consulting & software solutions company.
workExperience.title: Full Stack PHP Developer
workExperience.description: Contributed to moving a new version of the platform forward.
milestones: Developed and maintained a web application for the Finnet fintech client, resulting in a 12% increase in user engagement.
Collaborated on upgrading the SMS delivery platform, achieving a 20% increase in SMS delivery success rates.
Successfully addressed a high-priority bug causing payment reminder delays, resulting in an 80% reduction in customer complaints.
Implemented policy change alerts using Vue.js, leading to a 45% increase in user awareness.
Integrated an API-driven customer service chatbot, resulting in a 20% reduction in customer support inquiries.
Strengthened server security with more stringent CORS rules, decreasing security-related incidents by 5%.

workExperience.companyDescription: A Brazilian e-commerce company that offers printing services.

Fostered a collaborative development environment, organizing global programming sessions for cross-team knowledge sharing.
Deployed and integrated a notification system for newly added designs, resulting in a 7% increase in customer satisfaction.

workExperience.companyDescription: A Brazilian startup that offers a social media reporting tool.

Collaborated with the team to implement performance improvements across the entire database.
